Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Weapon release circuit malfunction. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fire Control component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 22/11/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
